name: Dice Invasion (Clearlynoone)
description:
A small infinite defense game where an onslaught of dice come to destroy your town! Defend by assembling munitions for your cannons.

My little brothers and I made this game for the GMTK Game Jam 2022. This was our first game jam for both of us and overall, we're quite proud that we managed to finish a game (rough as it is).

Any feedback is greatly appreciated :).
